class  FlowController
 Flow Controllers take a vector of cache changes (by reference) and return a filtered vector, with a collection of changes this filter considers valid for sending, ordered by its subjective priority. More...

Detailed Description

Includes the elements necessary to interface between the transport layer and the FastRTPS library.
